hub.title: Hub Url
hub.description:
This is the URL to reach your ESP-based hub.

For better performance use the IP address of the hub directly. If you are using the IP address, please ensure to reserve the IP address in your router's DHCP settings in order to prevent it from changing frequently.

displayName.title: Display Name (something unique)
displayName.description: This name will be visible on your Home App. Ensure that you provide a unique bulb name.

deviceId.title: Bulb ID
deviceId.description: This is a 2-byte device ID. Can be decimal or hexadecimal.

remoteType.title: Remote Type
remoteType.description: Type of remote that is used to control the bulb.

deviceGroup.title: Group of your bulb
deviceGroup.description: Group ID. Should be 0-8, depending on remote type. Group 0 is a "wildcard" group. All bulbs paired with the same device ID will respond to commands sent to Group 0.

autoDiscoverDevices.title: Auto discover bulbs directly defined in the hub (experimental)
autoDiscoverDevices.description: If you have defined "aliases" in the ESP-based hub's web interface, then they can be automatically imported when this setting is checked.
